name: Breast Button (starring Toffee!)
description:
Make Toffee's boobs really big!

A visual test that became a game! 4+ Months of work! Works on a real Game Boy Color*! Like 4 minutes of gameplay tops! Revel in my mediocre and hastily cobbled together dialogue!

(*probably! untested statement.)

Be sure to run it on a GBC supporting device so it runs-- sorry for not letting you play on older GB devices, it's for visual integrity I swear!! Fullscreen for best visuals in browser.

  • Browser emulator keyboard controls:
  • Z key/J key-> A button
  • X key/K key -> B button
  • Arrow Keys/WASD for D-Pad
  • Enter key -> Start button
  • Shift key -> Select button

I have probably overlooked something, please report issues you might have.

Made with GB Studio.
